statements: DELETE FROM ShoppingList WHERE list_id = 1 AND item_name = 'Milk';
DELETE FROM ShoppingList WHERE item_quantity > 10 AND list_name = 'Grocery';
DELETE FROM ShoppingList WHERE quantity > 10 AND purchased = TRUE;
DELETE FROM ToDoList WHERE status = 'pending' AND due_date < '2022-09-30';
DELETE FROM voice_commands WHERE command_type = 'search' AND command_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM todo_lists WHERE list_name = 'Grocery List';
DELETE FROM shopping_items WHERE list_id = 2 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM voice_commands WHERE command_type = 'reminder' AND executed_at < '2022-01-01';
